p:
A10: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(1″H-pyrrol-2-yl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 80%; m.p. 75 °C; R
f = 0.68 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1650 (C=O), 1501 (CH=CH), 1618 (C=C Ar), 1242 (-CF 3), 1370 (C-N), 3115 (Ar C-H stretching); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm), δ: 7.77 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.11 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.74–8.23 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 6.08–6.96 (3H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, Ar-H), 9.93 (1H, s, -NH); ESI-MS: 266.23 [M + H] +.
